shap_negative_factors:
- High Credit Utilization (85%)
- Two missed payments in last 6 months
- Debt-to-Income ratio is 45%
shap_positive_factors:
- No bankruptcies
- 5 years of credit history
document_context:
NOTICE OF ADVERSE ACTION

Dear Applicant,
We are unable to approve your loan application at this time.

Reason(s) for denial:
- Income verification failed.
- The requested loan amount exceeds our limits for your credit tier.
- Policy Section 4.2: Maximum DTI allowed is 40%.
